description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

318 Liverpool Road, Islington, London N7 8PU

TPO Reference:

T7 Lime front garden by footpath of LBI (No.3) TPO 1976 

T8 Lime centre front garden of LBI (No. 3) TPO 1976.
 
T9 Lime Front Garden of LBI (No. 3) TPO 1976  


PO Number:

T090253

Work specifications:

T7 Lime front garden by footpath of LBI (No.3) TPO 1976 
-	Remove Epicormic growth up to 6 metres
-	Crown Thin by 15% to no more than 20%
-	Remove Deadwood in the crown.

T8 Lime centre front garden of LBI (No. 3) TPO 1976.
-	Remove Epicormic growth up to 6 metres
-	Crown Thin by 15% to no more than 20%
-	Remove Deadwood in the crown.


T9 Lime Front Garden of LBI (No. 3) TPO 1976  
-	Remove Epicormic growth up to 6 metres
-	Crown Thin by 15% to no more than 20%
-	Remove Deadwood in the crown.
-	Reduce back overhang to house leaving a gap of 3 metres.
